# [Interview #638: Alloy of Law Signing Report - ValMar, Entry #5](https://www.theoryland.com/intvmain.php?i=638#5)

#### Question

Has Min's viewing of Gawyn either kneeling to or killing Egwene (from
*The Shadow Rising*
47) come to pass?

#### Brandon Sanderson

Yes.
